message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1,000,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $700,000 for this product.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $950,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth it.
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my range.  To be honest, $950,000 is still a bit of a stretch for my budget. How about we settle at $825,000? That feels like a fair compromise to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, $825,000 is still a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'll counteroffer at $950,000 again, but this time I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a comprehensive support package and a 1-year warranty. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
